recipe.title: Kippers and Bits
ingredients: 4 leaves crisp lettuce (such as Boston, romaine or Bibb)
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Combine the mayonnaise, yogurt, lemon zest and juice. Set aside. Toast the bread. To assemble the sandwiches, place the bread on a work surface and spread with the lemony sauce. Top with 1 leaf of lettuce (fold it if necessary), 1 slice of tomato, 1 slice of onion, one-fourth of the kipper filets and 1 ounce/28 grams of the avocado. Season with freshly ground black pepper.
